date: # Transactions Template for PFIC QEF Tool
# date: Transaction date in YYYY-MM-DD format (preferred
# quantity: Number of shares/units (up to 4 decimal places)
# exchange_rate: CAD to USD rate (optional if using --use-boc-rates flag)
# - Only BUY and SELL transactions matching the ticker in your config will be processed
# - Only transactions from the tax year specified in your config are included in reports

type: you MUST provide exchange_rate for CAD transactions

date: # - All amounts should be positive (negative values will generate warnings)
